subject: Re: Loo.k.i.ng for friend?
body:
Dear friend,
I found your picture on one of the websites, can we talk to 
each other?a Ia might be coming to your place in few weeks.
a
This would be a greaat oapportunity to meet each other.
Btw,a I am a woman. I am 25. Drop me aa line at uaj@BounceEmail.info
